sys_ux_client_script.name: Dashboard Widget Clicked

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_d5a89de9834ef2104acac396feaad3cf
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes>fdacb518b7320110aab961d9ce11a989</includes><macroponent display_value="Dashboards">55a89de9834ef2104acac396feaad3bd</macroponent><name>Dashboard Widget Clicked</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
	helpers.timing.setTimeout(function() {
		const polarisProperty = this.ux_globals.sysprops['glide.ui.polaris.experience'];
        const polarisUserPref = this.ux_globals.userPrefs['glide.ui.polaris.use'];
        const isPolarisDisabled = !(
           polarisProperty.toString().toLowerCase() === 'true' &&
           polarisUserPref === 'true'
        );

		const {getPayload} = imports['sn_app_analytics_w.ParWidgetsDrilldowns']();	
    	const payload = getPayload(event, isPolarisDisabled, this);	
		api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', payload);
	});
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Sameh</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-26 01:24:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>d5a89de9834ef2104acac396feaad3cf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Dashboard Widget Clicked</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Facility Issue Reporting System " source="x_1850913_facili_0">1cf4c9a3833d32104acac396feaad3c1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Facility Issue Reporting System ">1cf4c9a3833d32104acac396feaad3c1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d5a89de9834ef2104acac396feaad3cf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Sameh</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-26 01:24:54</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
